mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog(title, markdown, userId, blogTypeId, tagId, updateDate) VALUE (#{title}, #{markdown}, #{userId}, #{blogTypeId}, #{tagId}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE blog SET title = #{title}, markdown = #{markdown}, blogTypeId = #{blogTypeId}, tagId = #{tagId}, updateDate = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id} AND userId = #{userId}
